item.description: So, Noah Caldwell-Gervais just put out a new video where he reviews From Software’s biggest three non-Dark Souls titles – Bloodborne, Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, and Elden Ring. After I got over the excitement of getting another four whole hours of Noah’s admirable insight and enviable way with words, I got to a point in the video where he had begun discussing his perspective on the way FromSoft tends to approach difficulty, in that their games often allow players to subtlely tailor the game’s challenge to their skill level and preferences.
